<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/store/order/{orderId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and &lt; 10. Other values will generated exceptions

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orderId","in":"path","description":"ID of pet that needs to be fetched","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":1,"maximum":10}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
